column2: Oh my, did you just trudge through all that snow and ice? You must be absolutely exhausted. Well, welcome to the harbor town of Saronia.
Recently, pirates have been spotted roaming about town. Keep your wits about you if you want to stay safe.
I hope that our thane has some kind of solution for dealing with those machines.
You know, it almost feels like we’ve all been born anew.
Or rather, it’s more like the entire town has a whole new life ahead of it.
